attributes.action: Stop stalling introducing the Marine Bill and introduce protected conservation and no take areas around the UK coastline, like the protected site in Lundy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have such fantastic marine life around the UK coastline from basking sharks, to leatherback turtles, skate to dolphins and whales. 

There are only three protected reserves in the UK and only one of these around Lundy is totally protected. This area is 1.27sq miles or 0.00045% of the UK continental shelf area. 

This is not good enough. Stop stalling.
